TITLE: Price Increases Cooled Notably in November as Inflation Began to Ease
SUMMARY: Consumer Price Index data reinforces that inflation is beginning to cool down just ahead of the Federal Reserve’s December rate decision.

SUMMARY: The FTX founder Sam Bankman-Fried’s mother and father, who teach at Stanford Law School, are under scrutiny for their connections to their son’s crypto business.

SUMMARY: Sam Bankman-Fried and Changpeng Zhao were archrivals. With FTX gone, Binance, the world’s biggest crypto exchange, is trying to step into the void.

SUMMARY: A criminal indictment unsealed on Tuesday and a complaint by the S.E.C. describe years of wrongdoing in Sam Bankman-Fried’s crypto empire.

SUMMARY: The internal study details the vacation rental company’s antidiscrimination efforts. But some travelers of color say it and other home-share companies don’t go far enough.

TITLE: Takeaways From November’s CPI Inflation Report
SUMMARY: Core inflation, which strips out volatile food and energy prices, slowed to 6 percent over the year, an indication that price increases are slowing broadly.

SUMMARY: Now under arrest, the fallen crypto mogul faces a barrage of charges, including defrauding investors out of billions.

SUMMARY: United plans to take delivery of the planes over an eight-year span to refresh its fleet and increase fuel efficiency, with an option to buy 100 more.

SUMMARY: The slowdown in price gains in November provided Wall Street with a strong indication that the Federal Reserve could slow down interest rate increases.

SUMMARY: But achieving full-body restoration of movement, as Elon Musk envisions with such devices, is considered far into the future, if at all.

SUMMARY: A statement by the government of the Bahamas said Mr. Bankman-Fried was arrested after prosecutors in the United States filed criminal charges.

SUMMARY: Sam Bankman-Fried’s choices may signal an end to the schlubby mystique.

SUMMARY: A criminal indictment unsealed on Tuesday and a complaint by the S.E.C. describe years of wrongdoing in Sam Bankman-Fried’s crypto empire.

SUMMARY: Twitter has stopped paying rent on offices and is considering not paying severance packages to former employees, among other measures.

SUMMARY: The chief magistrate said Mr. Bankman-Fried’s access to financial resources made his risk of fleeing “so great” that he had to remain behind bars.

SUMMARY: “I think it’s fair to say,” the federal prosecutor, Damian Williams, said of the Samuel Bankman-Fried case, “that by anyone’s lights, this is one of the biggest financial frauds in American history.”

SUMMARY: He and LeAlan Jones recorded stories of life and death in a Chicago housing project for NPR, winning a Peabody Award and inspiring the birth of StoryCorps.

SUMMARY: Hanno Berger, a former lawyer and tax adviser, was at the center of a scandal that cost Germany nearly $300 million.

SUMMARY: Wall Street is expecting the Federal Reserve to slow down its interest rate increases, but the central bank’s meeting on Wednesday offers investors a reason to be cautious.

SUMMARY: Central bankers are still fighting inflation, but are poised to slow to a rate increase of half a percentage point at their final meeting of 2022.

SUMMARY: Black customers have long claimed that the nation’s largest home insurer discriminates against them. A lawsuit claims a nine-month study provides some proof.

TITLE: U.K. Inflation Rate Slows to 10.7 Percent
SUMMARY: The pace of price rises in November edged lower, from 11.1 percent, but households are still being squeezed as wages fail to keep up.

SUMMARY: “Don’t get too drunk at work” is a good rule. Don’t let co-workers convince you to break it.

SUMMARY: The fallen crypto mogul Sam Bankman-Fried plans to fight extradition as charges pile up in what prosecutors called a record financial fraud.

SUMMARY: The storm destroyed up to 300,000 beehives, the Florida State Beekeepers Association said. The loss could have far-reaching consequences for the country’s food supply.

TITLE: Are Mushrooms the Future of Alternative Leather?
SUMMARY: MycoWorks uses mycelium, the substance in the root structure of mushrooms, to make Reishi, which has the look and feel of leather. Big-name companies are very interested.

SUMMARY: Ana Shellem has found peace and prosperity while searching for wild species off the North Carolina coast for her one-woman sustainable fishing company.

SUMMARY: The action pushes the benchmark rate to its highest since 2008, but the central bank moderated the pace of increases as Britain braces for a prolonged recession.

SUMMARY: Ever experienced buyer’s remorse? Of course you have. But there are ways to prevent it.

SUMMARY: The e-commerce giant avoided a fine, but will make a variety of changes regulators believe will help independent merchants who had raised alarms about Amazon’s tactics.

How to Read the Fed’s Interest Rate Projections

SUMMARY: Pound notes with the new sovereign’s image will begin appearing in 2024, though money with his mother’s likeness will still be in circulation.

SUMMARY: His reporting on delayed care for military veterans at Veterans Affairs hospitals led to the resignation of the secretary of the department.
